FuncDef:
The measure command configures the counter of a generalflow test instance.
The undo measure command restores the counter of a generalflow test instance to the default value.
By default, no counter of a generalflow test instance is configured.

ParaDef.Info:
Indicates a packet loss ratio test.
-

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To configure the counter of a generalflow test instance, run the measure command. The following counters can be used:
Throughput: maximum number of bits that can be sent along a link every second. The value is expressed in kbit/s.Packet loss ratio: percentage of discarded packets to all sent packets.Delay: time elapsed when a test packet is sent and returned. The value is expressed in microseconds.

Prerequisites
The measure command can only be used for generalflow test instances.
Follow-up Procedure
Configure other test parameters in specific test scenarios.
Precautions
You cannot change this configuration of a running test instance.
